0.1.1.name: wordpress/captcha-control-unique-form-captcha-security
0.1.1.description:
Captcha Control gives you more control over your captcha's. You can use the standard Captcha text image, our handy affiliate network to make commission from using our Advertisement Captchas with unique scroll to align Captcha's or use your own Advertisements. Shortcode: [captcha_control] Make sure to grab your API Key from http://www.captchacontrol.com Features:

Including:

  • Unique slide security
  • Commission available advertisements
  • Advertise your best selling products as your captcha
  • Normal captcha image
  • Easy Shortcode
  • Optional contact form
